title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls as a defense against Titans.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: A high school student finds a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone.

title: Demon Slayer
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: A boy fights demons after his family is slaughtered and his sister becomes one.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: A world where people with superpowers called Quirks are the norm.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a deadly encounter.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: A young boy searches for his father who is a legendary Hunter.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: A high school student joins a secret organization to fight Curses.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: A young man merges with a devil and becomes Chainsaw Man.

title: Spy x Family
author: Tatsuya Endo
description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepath form a fake family.

title: Vinland Saga
author: Makoto Yukimura
description: A Viking warrior's journey of revenge and redemption.

title: Vagabond
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: The story of legendary swordsman Miyamoto Musashi.

title: Slam Dunk
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: A delinquent joins the basketball team to impress a girl.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: A lone warrior seeks revenge against demons.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: The adventures of Goku from childhood to adulthood.

title: Vagabond
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: Based on the novel Musashi by Eiji Yoshikawa.

title: Monster
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A surgeon's decision to save a boy leads to horrifying consequences.

title: Parasyte
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
description: Aliens invade Earth by taking over human bodies.

title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
author: Aka Akasaka
description: Two prideful geniuses try to make the other confess their love first.

title: Horimiya
author: HERO & Daisuke Hagiwara
description: A popular girl and a gloomy boy discover each other's hidden sides.

title: Blue Lock
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
description: 300 strikers compete to become Japan's greatest egoist striker.

title: Tokyo Revengers
author: Ken Wakui
description: A man travels back in time to save his girlfriend from being killed.

title: Haikyuu!!
author: Haruichi Furudate
description: A short boy dreams of becoming a volleyball champion.

title: The Promised Neverland
author: Kaiu Shirai
description: Children at an orphanage discover a horrifying secret.

title: Blue Exorcist
author: Kazue Kato
description: The son of Satan aims to become an exorcist.

title: Black Clover
author: Yuki Tabata
description: A boy without magic aims to become the Wizard King.

title: Dr. Stone
author: Riichiro Inagaki
description: Humanity is petrified for thousands of years, one boy awakens to rebuild civilization.

title: Fire Force
author: Atsushi Ohkubo
description: Firefighters with special abilities fight spontaneous human combustion.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: A celestial wizard joins the rowdy Fairy Tail guild.

title: Soul Eater
author: Atsushi Ohkubo
description: Students at Death Weapon Meister Academy fight evil souls.

title: Noragami
author: Adachitoka
description: A minor god seeks to build his own shrine.

title: Mob Psycho 100
author: ONE
description: A powerful esper tries to live a normal life.

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K
author: Shuuichi Asou
description: A psychic high schooler just wants peace and quiet.

title: Akame ga Kill!
author: Takahiro
description: An assassin group fights to overthrow a corrupt empire.

title: Magi
author: Shinobu Ohtaka
description: A boy and his friends explore dungeons in a world inspired by Arabian Nights.

title: D.Gray-man
author: Katsura Hoshino
description: Exorcists fight demons called Akuma.

title: Beelzebub
author: Ryuhei Tamura
description: A delinquent becomes the babysitter for the demon lord's son.

title: Toriko
author: Mitsutoshi Shimabukuro
description: Gourmet hunters search for rare ingredients.

title: Assassination Classroom
author: Yusei Matsui
description: Students must assassinate their alien teacher before he destroys Earth.

title: World Trigger
author: Daisuke Ashihara
description: A defense organization protects Earth from dimensional invaders.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro fights to turn his demon sister back into a human.

title: Ao Ashi
author: Yugo Kobayashi
description: A talented football player from the countryside joins a youth academy.

title: Kuroko no Basket
author: Tadatoshi Fujimaki
description: A phantom sixth player aims to make his team the best in Japan.

title: Eyeshield 21
author: Riichiro Inagaki
description: A timid boy becomes the star running back of a football team.

title: One Punch Man
author: ONE & Yusuke Murata
description: A hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch.

title: Gintama
author: Hideaki Sorachi
description: A samurai and his friends do odd jobs in an alien-invaded Japan.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
author: Nobuhiro Watsuki
description: A former assassin atones for his past by helping others.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: A delinquent becomes a spirit detective after dying.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: Generations of the Joestar family fight supernatural threats.

title: Code Geass
author: Goro Taniguchi
description: A prince gains the power to control anyone and leads a rebellion.
